4 August 2020

Ninpwn Draws First Blood on the VetSec Scholarship Practical Challenge!


   

Grats to my buddy and CTF team captain Ninpwn for being the first to conquer the Veteran Security 2020 Scholarship practical challenge!

Best of luck to him in the upcoming selection process!
